 上一个类   下一个类 框架    无框架

android.view
接口 KeyEvent.Callback

所有已知实现类：
AbsListView, AbsoluteLayout, AbsSeekBar, AbsSpinner, AbstractInputMethodService, Activity, ActivityGroup, AdapterView, AlertDialog, AliasActivity, AnalogClock, AppWidgetHostView, AutoCompleteTextView, Button, CharacterPickerDialog, CheckBox, CheckedTextView, Chronometer, CompoundButton, DatePicker, DatePickerDialog, DialerFilter, Dialog, DigitalClock, EditText, ExpandableListActivity, ExpandableListView, ExtractEditText, FrameLayout, Gallery, GLSurfaceView, GridView, HorizontalScrollView, ImageButton, ImageSwitcher, ImageView, InputMethodService, KeyboardView, LauncherActivity, LinearLayout, ListActivity, ListView, MediaController, MultiAutoCompleteTextView, PreferenceActivity, ProgressBar, ProgressDialog, RadioButton, RadioGroup, RatingBar, RelativeLayout, ScrollView, SeekBar, SlidingDrawer, Spinner, SurfaceView, TabActivity, TabHost, TableLayout, TableRow, TabWidget, TextSwitcher, TextView, TimePicker, TimePickerDialog, ToggleButton, TwoLineListItem, VideoView, View, ViewAnimator, ViewFlipper, ViewGroup, ViewStub, ViewSwitcher, WebView, ZoomButton, ZoomControls
包容类：
KeyEvent
public static interface KeyEvent.Callback

方法摘要
 boolean onKeyDown(int keyCode, KeyEvent event)
          Called when a key down event has occurred.
 boolean onKeyMultiple(int keyCode, int count, KeyEvent event)
          Called when multiple down/up pairs of the same key have occurred in a row.
 boolean onKeyUp(int keyCode, KeyEvent event)
          Called when a key up event has occurred.
 

方法详细信息

onKeyDown

boolean onKeyDown(int keyCode,
                  KeyEvent event)
Called when a key down event has occurred.

参数：
keyCode - The value in event.getKeyCode().
event - Description of the key event.
返回：
If you handled the event, return true. If you want to allow the event to be handled by the next receiver, return false.

onKeyUp

boolean onKeyUp(int keyCode,
                KeyEvent event)
Called when a key up event has occurred.

参数：
keyCode - The value in event.getKeyCode().
event - Description of the key event.
返回：
If you handled the event, return true. If you want to allow the event to be handled by the next receiver, return false.

onKeyMultiple

boolean onKeyMultiple(int keyCode,
                      int count,
                      KeyEvent event)
Called when multiple down/up pairs of the same key have occurred in a row.

参数：
keyCode - The value in event.getKeyCode().
count - Number of pairs as returned by event.getRepeatCount().
event - Description of the key event.
返回：
If you handled the event, return true. If you want to allow the event to be handled by the next receiver, return false.

 上一个类   下一个类 框架    无框架
